# Barefoot King Championship

+ days)

The  is a title in the Japanese professional wrestling promotion Pro Wrestling Freedoms. The title was established in 2023 and is defended in hardcore matches involving various weapons in which the competitors are barefoot. The title can be held by both individual wrestlers and by tag teams. The champion is simply being referred to as the Barefoot King.
The title is currently held by the Brahman Brothers (Brahman Shu and Brahman Kei).
Title history
As of  , , there have been a total of fourteen reigns shared between thirteen individual champions, four tag teams and five vacancies.
